tool_description: API showing all the news in NBA
name: Nba News
title: Nba News

api_list.name: Get individual NBA source news
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://nba-news.p.rapidapi.com/news/sapo"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "nba-news.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://nba-news.p.rapidapi.com/news/{newspaperid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "nba-news.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
